Package net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy

The package contains the query strategies for single label data.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSingleLabelQueryStrategy
    Abstract class for single label query strategies.
    DensityDiversityQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Density Diversity query strategy.
    EntropySamplingQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Entropy Sampling Strategy (Uncertainty Sampling) query strategy.
    ErrorReductionQueryStrategy
    Abstract class for Error Reduction family of query strategies.
    ExpectedCeroOneLossQueryStrategy
    The objective here is to reduce the expected total number of incorrect predictions.
    ExpectedLogLossQueryStrategy
    This class minimizes the expected log-loss, which is equivalent to reducing the expected entropy over unlabeled set.
    KullbackLeiblerDivergenceQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Query By Committee query strategy, variant: Kullback-Leibler (KL) divergence.
    LeastConfidentSamplingQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Least Confident Strategy (Uncertainty Sampling) query strategy.
    MarginSamplingQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Margin Sampling Strategy (Uncertainty Sampling) query strategy.
    QueryByCommitte
    Abstract class for query by committee family of query strategies.
    RandomSelectionQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Random selection query strategy.
    RelevanceSamplingQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Relevance Sampling query strategy.
    UncertaintySamplingQueryStrategy
    Abstract class for Uncertainty Sampling family of query strategies.
    VarianceReductionQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Variance Reduction query strategy.
    VoteEntropyQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Query By Committee query strategy, variant: Vote entropy.

Package net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy Description

The package contains the query strategies for single label data.
